anith eewa nam ela...eeka amathaka karannako, mata methana thiyena samahara foto baladdi sapthapadi eke pul eka gawa indan issaraha baladdi pena koridowa mathak una, ee ayida kiyalayi mama me kappana kale,heh heh...heta ee paththe yannath oone, ee kiwwe sapthapadi nemeyi, sathnapure...daru pawula ekkagena enna epayi...kolu patiya dakinna nathuwa mara paluwen me dawas tike hitiye...

ohu pentar nam aluth wasagamak laba ganne da ebawini.ohuge piyanan da ebanduma kalakaruwaku wiya.widhimath nowu mulika adhyapanayakin pasu baburaoo natak mandali nam natya kandaya me siyaluma murthi pasuthala andum palandum nirmanaya, pracharaka chithra shilpaya aadi boho karana sadaha dayaka wiya.pentarge hawulkaru wuye ohuge massina nathahoth gnyathi sohoyuruwu aananda raooya.mulma indiyanu chithrapatayen kulmath wu baburaoo saha aanandaraoo bombaye kalu kadayakin milayata gath kamarawak samaga wadata basseya.dala seya pata hingaya samaga owun siya mul aramuna madak wenas kota kolahapur hi shiwaji sinamahale chithrapata pradarshanaya arambauha.owun pradarshanaya kala sama chithrapatayakinma yamak igena ganimata uthsaha kalaha.wada hondin rupayen katha kiyanne kelesada owun igena ganimata uthsaha kale eyayi.swadeshi wyaparaye hithawathaku wu baburaoo 1919 wasare di bomabaye pawathwu kongras pakshaye maha samuluwa aananadaraoo samaga wartha chithrapatayata nanwuyeya.eheth aanandaraoo niwmoniyawen miya yama pentarta balawath paduwak wuyeya.
